payload.name: kv-cache-is-a-physical-resource-budget-it-like-os-pages
payload.title: KV-cache is a physical resource; budget it like OS pages
payload.formal: KV-cache capacity (M) limits concurrent sequences; eviction policy affects recomputation.
payload.apm2_mapping: **agent working memory is KV-cache**. ContextPacks are effectively “pinned pages.” Budget token/context per lease and per risk class. If a task requires more context than allowed, that’s a *context defect* (pack miss) and should be logged as such, not worked around by “just retrieve more.”
